post.body: Awesome, thank you very much. (:
Weird. I had a bunny once a long time ago, and he bonded with me really well. Maybe it was the bunny. (:
Do you have bunnies? Dru wants one but I've no clue about them whatsoever (except for the evil vs cute thing). (:
Pace and I set aside specific date nights to make sure we have time to connect, and we don't break them no matter what. (:
Woo! Have a good trip, darling! <3
Yeeeee! I'm so glad you like them so much! (: *hugs*
I f'n love your hair. Omg, it's awesome and amazing and beautiful. (:
hee! I've never been to Boston. Or Cali, for that matter. In any case, squee! (:
Ooooooh, a California present!! How exciting! (:
I've seen that before! It's so cool. It's also several *million* dollars, yeesh. (:
OMG!! That's so cool!
It is apparently a cat skull. I'm proud of myself for guessing that when I found it.
Gays for Truant!
Well, your face is hidden by an apple, but you're clearly not naked, so you're probably just the right amount of exposed.
Ahhhh, cleaned out my closet. Got rid of so much stuff! Muuuuuch better now. I feel happier and lighter! Yay!
Wow, I've been totally blindsided by an unexpected bigot. I thought she was a friend. I was wrong. ):
I'm defending my religion while my sweet ratlings sleep in my shirt. Kinda surreal, actually.
Pace is utterly my heroess. She's killing a GIANT bug for me, even though she's terrified, too.
Happy unbirthday, everyone!
My son is amazing and sweet: "Mommy, take care of me by taking care of yourself."
Ahh, 30 mins of house cleaning and I feel WAY better! (:
I am extremely amused by this: http://www.tysknews.com/LiteStuff/biscuit.htm
Our books are arriving, people are reading and loving them. This is so amazing and exciting, omg!
I'm all set up and ready for my ratlings to come home now - just three more days!! (: I'm so happy and excited!!
Wow, I suddenly totally get why most alien-encounter movies involve global destruction by the advanced aliens - it's the usual error!
Sometimes, I cry because I know I'll never have the time to listen to all of the amazing and beautiful music in the world.
This article (http://tinyurl.com/5nafcm) makes my iPhone EVEN BETTER! Thank you, @enderVR!
Myself and @PaceSmith are going no-mail for a few days, starting tomorrow morning. Better get us tonight if you need us before Friday! (:
Pace made me a falafel k!! hahahaha! http://twitpic.com/vg8s
I scored the hottest shirt I've ever owned today! Woo!
I'm playing MySims Kingdom, chilling with my ratlings and my sweetie on the couch. Ahh.
I'm still glowing and squee-ing from my treasure hunt. *glow*
OMG, Pace did a Yule treasure hunt for ME, got me EVERYTHING on my list, gave AWESOME hints - I'm astounded and delighted!!!!! (: (:
me: "I'm doing self work without the work!" Pace: "Yeah, you must've ordered the gnomes to work and then forgot."
The weather here is disgusting. And I have all this stuff to do today, to boot. Boot! Boot!
Squeeee! @PaceSmith is making dinner! <3 http://twitpic.com/u2sm
I am completely smitten with my ratlings. They charm me ceaselessly. They keep grooming me and clicking at me. Adorable!
Wow, I just googled a medical thing and came away satisfied - and *not* worried that we all have terminal diseases. That's a first. (:
I have a skull in my pocket. http://twitpic.com/twmn
We're preparing for an early Yule celebration for our son. I'm excited!
